thread.title: $228+ R/T Caribbean, Mexico Sale from Southwest
thread.title_full: $228+ R/T Caribbean, Mexico Sale from Southwest

title: $228+ R/T Caribbean, Mexico Sale from Southwest
text:
Home > Flight Deals > $228+ R/T Caribbean, Mexico Sale from Southwest $228+ R/T Caribbean, Mexico Sale from Southwest September 29, 2015 7:08pm by Patricia Magaña , SmarterTravel Staff Tweet 
Fall and winter flights to sunny cities in the Caribbean and Mexico are on sale with Southwest, though only through Thursday, October 8. Featured destinations include Cancun, Los Cabos, Montego Bay, and Nassau; with starting rates at $228 round-trip. 
Travel availability is Mondays-Thursdays during October 13-December 16 and again January 11-March 3 for most routes. See the sale provider for fine route-specific details. EDITOR'S OVERVIEW Where to Book: The best prices were found for the travel window of these sales by using a flexible date search, which can be accessed through our flight comparison tool to the right. You can find this promotion on Southwest 's sale page. Pros: Sunny places good for travel during the colder months. Cons: Few routes. Verdict: Great sale if the routes and dates apply, especially because Southwest permits two free checked bags. SEARCH FOR THIS DEAL!
